content:
modifiers |= DG.DIRECT_ALT_MOD
                messenger.send('DIRECT-mouse1', sentArgs = [modifiers])
            elif self.fMouse2:
                modifiers = DG.DIRECT_NO_MOD
                modifiers |= DG.DIRECT_ALT_MOD
                messenger.send('DIRECT-mouse2', sentArgs = [modifiers])
            elif self.fMouse3:
                modifiers = DG.DIRECT_NO_MOD
                modifiers |= DG.DIRECT_ALT_MOD
                messenger.send('DIRECT-mouse3', sentArgs = [modifiers])
        elif input == 'alt-up':
            self.fAlt = 0
